> > Even if you buy into the "new media types are evil" meme (which
> I don=
't), what's wrong with a content type of
> "application/vnd.ms-excel;vocabu=
lary+hal"?

Is that doable? It certainly looks like a good solution - but i=
s it generally accepted (a standard) that "application/vnd.ms-excel;vocabul=
ary+hal" is the same as "application/vnd.ms-excel" when it comes to parsing=
 the content? Will for instance Microsoft Excel open up from my browser if =
I clicked on a link the returned "application/vnd.ms-excel;vocabulary+hal"?=


/J=F8rn
